name: Skirmish Demo
description:
This is a work-in-progress preview of the final game. In the demo you can play a few levels of the single/coop campaign, and the arena mode, which is the heart of Skirmish.

Arena mode can be played with up to 4 players, or as a hot-seat tournament with many more.

The game also has a Twitch integration that lets viewers of your Twitch channel appear as spectators in the background.

Tell us what you think of the demo. We're very curious to hear about your experience.

Win a Steam key!

As a bonus, we will randomly distribute 10 Steam keys of the full game among everyone who has publicly streamed / recorded their play session. We want to watch you play!

The rules:
Your play session of Skirmish has to be publicly visible on YouTube or Twitch before the 24th of december. It has to be at least 20 minutes long and include your voice! You also have to post a link to your play session in the comments! Good luck!
